attributes.action: make it compulsory for passports to be used to make up any social media accounts
attributes.additional_details: Because people are losing their lives and people are getting hurt by people with like accounts it must stop in a simple way of stopping this is to make it compulsory for people to be who they meant to be so at least asked for a driving license or a passport so you can trace back everybody’s actions and I want to make this a law
attributes.background: I would like the government to make it law for people to open social media accounts To have proof of who they are so if anything goes wrong then we can trace it back to the person that done wrong because too many people are losing their lives and confidence over false accounts
